title: A Montage
body:
So i'm considering making a montage of plays, and the main thing is i'd want it to be on one champion, so you know what i'm gonna just  put a poll for this.

Which champion would you most want to see a montage of plays for.

replies.body: We need a talon montage, they look so bloody awesome.

I've never been good on AD mid laners in general unless they were ADC's mid (ironically my worst role)

I'm a shit Zed, i'm a shit Yasuo, honestly don't think i'd be any better on Talon.
The suggested champion that never got suggested though.
The vote for suggested champ in the comments, the 2 comments are both champs on the list.
I see, people (like me) were throwing in ideas and opinions to sell the idea to you
yeah but the ideas are on the list :P
I would make a viktor montage but OBS lags me too hard fps wise. I cri evry tim ;'(

Good to see some creative content coming out of OCE!

Good luck mate
We see a lot of this

Ahri would be sick, she has a "hook" kite and multi hit skill shot

If you can pull off sick plays then I would forever spam the like button on your youtube page 

(assuming its up there)
Honestly, it's been a while, but i'm pretty sure if i played her solid for a week i'd get up there with some sick plays.
Viktor and for the cliche montage dubstep use "Destroy them with lazers"
Same could be said about your stream, IF YOU EVER HAD VIEWERS!!!!
What? I don't even have a stream you shitlord
